name: Escape from Minos
description:
The adventurous life of Theseus has taken him to Crete. But our hero did not consider Minos King, who has kidnapped him to be the protagonist of the big show of Greece: the Minos Labyrinth.

Theseus is lost in an endless maze, where the Minotaur is the king and lord. Its mission is to flee, but... why not pick up the treasures of the previous victims?

Game 

This is an endless game. The goal is to flee, find lost treasures and collect the diamonds that appear in the bonus stages. These phases appear every five labyrinths. You need a key to escape. When you're near, Theseus' heartbeat accelerates.

The score takes first the number of treasures (more treasures appear in top of records), and second, the number of diamonds (at same number of mazes and treasures, the more diamonds above), and third, the number of mazes (at same number of treasures, the more mazes will be higher in the classification).

Experience

Ultratumba have EXPERIENCES, an achievement open library designed for GP2X and PC. You can win this achievements (1000 points, 32 exps) if you install the Exp Application.

Language

English and Spanish.

Controls GAMEPADKEYSDIRECTIONJOY/PADCURSORSSELECTAZMAPYSPAUSEBACKESCAPE
